feed.title: Category: Ruby | You Will Never Walk Alone

entry.title: Ruby study note - 1
entry.content: I have read some pieces of several Ruby books, but never finish one of them, nor did do enough exercises to practive my ruby skill. So this time, I'd like to do it more formaly. :) I will use this blog to track my learning step. And this is the first post for it. If you are also interested in ruby, maybe you can try to follow with this series.
